PERSONA:
meet david, a 55-year-old married man from a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region. he is a well-educated white non-hispanic individual with a college degree and some postgraduate education. david was born and raised in the united states and is a citizen.

despite being raised in a jewish family, david does not actively practice any religion and never attends religious services. he identifies as a moderate independent voter who is registered to vote but prefers not to disclose his specific political leanings or ideology.

financially, david is quite well-off, with an annual family income exceeding $100,000, placing him in the upper-income tier. he is almost constantly online, likely due to his work or personal interests.

while david does not volunteer, he leads a comfortable life in his metropolitan area, enjoying the amenities and opportunities it offers. he values his privacy and may be reluctant to share personal details, but he is generally a friendly and approachable individual.
